name: 7Zipper - File Explorer (zip, 7zip, rar)
description: This app help you to browse  (It is archiver/extractor and It is useful tools for file management, and it require some permissions.)  Features: List of supported compression formats. 7z jar List of supported decompression formats. zip, alz, egg, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, gz, bz2, rar, jar, 7z, lzh support split zip archive (z01, z02 ..., zip.001, zip.002 ..)  You can file management like copy,move,paste (for file, folder) You can file management like open,rename,delete (for file, folder) You can back up your app as a local file and install the backed up app.  It support image viewer (include animated gif) It support text viewer (you can open large text file) You can manage files of your phone by wifi with Ftp Client or Ftp Server or Http Server You can check sdcard usage You can resize image file (like jpg, png)  support file search & find string in text-files support lan-network support access for external storage support shortcut for system app permission manager
